pulse_drone_ii.name: Pulse Drone II
pulse_drone_ii.desc: Very light mass-produced drone. This model comes equipped with armor and a weak shield.

pulse_drone_wing.name: Pulse Drone Wing
pulse_drone_wing.desc: A trio of very light mass-produced drones.

laser_drone.name: Laser Drone
laser_drone.desc: Medium mass-produced drone, good for point defense.

laser_drone_ii.name: Laser Drone II
laser_drone_ii.desc: Medium mass-produced drone, good for point defense. This model comes equipped with a decent shield.

laser_drone_wing.name: Laser Drone Wing
laser_drone_wing.desc: A trio of medium mass-produced drone, good for point defense.

ai_core_gamma.name: AI Core Gamma
ai_core_gamma.desc: Cheap AI core, if any AI core can be called cheap. Has sub-humanoid intelligence, but can follow simple orders tirelessly.
ai_core_gamma._img: Should hint at video game avatars.

ai_core_beta.name: AI Core Beta
ai_core_beta.desc: The finest AI core the Nexus knows how to produce. Capable of performing at the level of a humanoid at essentially any task. Can't beat the best, but makes up for it in versatility.
ai_core_beta._img: Should hint at video game avatars.

ai_core_alpha._note: Made by the advanced mystery race that taught NexArk their robotics.
ai_core_alpha.name: AI Core Alpha
ai_core_alpha.desc: Super-intelligent. It might have already escaped the box it's in, but we wouldn't be able to tell.
ai_core_alpha._img: Should hint at video game avatars.

ore_processor.name: Ore Processor
ore_processor.desc: Processes ore as it's being mined to get rid of impurities, thus including yield. Also produces gems.

robobay.name: RoboBay
robobay.desc: A miniaturized charging station for robots.
